title: How Can I Install the Data Card?
answer:
A:To install the data card, do as follows:

**             Step 1      **Insert the data card into the PC directly or through a USB extension cable.

**             Step 2      **Wait about one minute. The related software drive is identified. 

![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20140923150926660001.jpg)

The drive displayed on the screen varies with the software version. 

In this document, the software working with the data cards is Mobile Partner. If your data card works with software of your operator instead of Mobile Partner, the release note associated with the software prevails.

**Figure 1-1 **Mobile Partner identified

![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20140923150926107002.gif)

**             Step 3      **The operating system (OS) automatically runs the setup program and installs the Mobile Partner step by step. 

**Figure 1-2 **Installer Language

![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20140923150926644003.jpg)

**             Step 4      **After the Mobile Partner is installed, click **Finish, **and then wait until the data card is restarted.

**Figure 1-3 **Completing the Mobile Partner Setup Wizard

![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20140923150926211004.jpg)

**             Step 5      **Load the drive. After the drive is normally loaded, the following devices are displayed in the device manager, as shown in Figure 1-4.

**Figure 1-4 **Loading the data card drive

![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20140923150927289005.gif)

**             Step 6      **Make sure that the installation takes effect, and then **restart the PC**. In this case, you can use the data card.

----End
